ps1.4:16.1: ca kho keci → ye keci kho (sya-all) | ye hi keci (pts-vp-pli1ed) | ye hi keci kho (mr)
ps1.4:82.1: Purimanidānaṃ → sāvatthinidānaṃ (bj) | paripuṇṇanidānaṃ (si, sya-all, mr) | pāripuṇṇanidānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ps1.4:88.2: assaddhiyasaṃvaraṭṭhena → assaddhiyaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ps1.4:92.58: bhāvanāvasena → ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanāvasena (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ps1.4:121.18: indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ → indriyaparopariyatte ñāṇaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed) | indriyānaṃ paropariyatte ñāṇaṃ (sya-all)
